---

### About Me:
Hi there! I'm Brennan, a certified Professional Scrum Master, program manager, and software engineer with a background in team leadership and consumer banking. In December 2022, I completed a software engineering immersive program through General Assembly, where I acquired a strong foundation in modern programming fundamentals. In my previous role, I was recognized by executive leadership for successfully creating and implementing a Quality Assurance Program. I am collaborative, communicative, and a skilled problem solver, eagerly seeking to make a difference and achieve great things in my next role.
